entry.title: WIND WARNING , Victoria
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 12:21 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.1°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 30 gusting to 50 except east 40 gusting to 60 near Juan de Fuca Strait this evening and after midnight. Low 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Haro Strait late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 70 gusting to 90 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
